attributes.action: Adjust Uni fees based on the amount of facetoface teaching the students receive
attributes.additional_details: students feel universities are not doing their best to provide the full course that we are paying for.  Student nurses need hands on teaching as the next generation of healthcare professionals and they are not getting not even 20% of what was sold to them! Government needs to stand up for the teaching of the next wave of nhs staff!
attributes.background: Adjust the fees to reflect the amount of face to face teaching (not on teams) that students receive

rejection.details:
Petitions must call for a specific action that the UK Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

The Government sets the maximum amount universities can charge for tuition fees, but decisions about setting tuition fees within this are a matter for individual universities, not the Government or Parliament. As a result it is not possible for the Government or Parliament to take the action you have requested.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Refund University tuition fees for 20/21 due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/595815

Wipe Student Debts for Tuition Fees for University Students Affect by Covid: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598155
